name: AmiKit
description:
AmiKit turns your computer, phone or tablet into high-end Workbench used in legendary Amiga computers (providing you have the original OS & ROM) 

AmiKit is free and includes more than 350 of the finest Amiga programs. You can surf web, read emails and documents, listen to or create your own music, burn CD/DVDs, edit images, play games and much more - all in good old Amiga way!
